name: Winterland Madness
description:
Winterland Madness is a wave based third-person shooter. 

Armed with a Snowman-RPG(rocket-propelled gift)-Launcher you have to defeat waves of incoming monsters.  Health potions, ammunition, gold and supply crates dropped by Santa himself will help you along the way.  Gold can be spent to upgrade your stats, ranging from damage all the way to increased stamina.

Fight your way throw 30 waves with 3 bosses to win the game. 

This game was created in one month and is far from perfect. But I hope you still find fun playing it!
